page.title: 19Wild Flowers
page.content: We went to pick some flowers within a few hundred yards fo the school, along Back Lane and on the Green in the last week of June l985.They were all growing wild and in flower. We thought a botanist in lOO years time would find our collection interesting as we found over 8O types of flowers and also we realized that our recordings would become historical evidence of flowers at the present time. Some of the flowers were: cinquefoil, madder, red campion and nipple-wort, spotted medick, sweet briar, geranium herb robert,bush vetch, porter,honeysuckle,creeping buttercup, dead nettle,lesser yellow trefoil,convolvulus,knapweed,grass vetch,woody nightshade,yellow flag, nettles, buttercups, daisies, white and zig-zag clovers, etc. Sarah
